name: vrc-auton
description: Autonomous builder for the Vex Robotics Competition

vrc-auton.directory.description:
Specifies where autons will be stored.
Elements should be an absolute path or a relative path (relative to the workspace).

commands.title: Show Auton Builder
commands.when: editorTextFocus && editorLangId == cpp && resourceFilename =~ /^.*\.cpp$/ && resourcePath not in vrc-auton.builder.visible

commands.title: Show Auton Builder to the Side
commands.when: editorTextFocus && editorLangId == cpp && resourceFilename =~ /^.*\.cpp$/ && resourcePath not in vrc-auton.builder.visible

commands.title: Hide Auton Builder
commands.when: editorFocus && editorLangId == cpp && resourceFilename =~ /^.*\.cpp$/ && resourcePath in vrc-auton.builder.visible

editor/context.when: editorTextFocus && resourceFilename =~ /^.*\.cpp$/ && resourcePath not in vrc-auton.builder.visible && resourceDirname in vrc-auton.autonDirs
